name: Bestbanners
body:
# Welcome to the BestBanners page by [Rajesh](http://www.rajeshsurana.com)!

In the senior year of under-graduation, I was awarded as BEST ADVERTISING AGENCY in “THE THIRD SIDE” (2010-11), a simulation of brand management organized by Rotaract club of WCE Sangli. 

Some of the posters, banners and pamphlets that I created...
## 1. Maverick Newspaper Advertisement
![Maverick Ad](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/BestBanners/master/Maverick.jpg)

## 2. Maverick Banner
![Maverick Banner](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/BestBanners/master/MaverickPoster.jpg)

## 3. Simease Banner
![Simease Banner](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rajeshsurana/BestBanners/master/Simease.jpg)

## 4. Simease Newspaper Ad

## 5. Simease Pamphlet

## 6. Yoshiko Banner

## 7. Yoshiko Pamphlet

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
